title: Integrate uploaded photos across single-page site and update favicon/branding

requirements.summary: Add all 12 uploaded images as optimized static assets and place them across hero and service sections with responsive, well-cropped layouts and alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: All 12 uploaded images are included in the built frontend as static assets (no backend/image fetching).
Hero section includes at least one of the uploaded tractor/music visuals in a prominent way without harming text readability (e.g., overlay/gradient as needed).

Each service section (Music Systems, Modification Materials, Electrical Mechanic Services) displays relevant uploaded imagery in a clean responsive layout (no broken aspect ratios, no overflow on mobile).
All images include English alt text (generic descriptive alt text is OK).
Page performance is maintained by using resized/optimized variants (no full-resolution originals used directly in main layout where unnecessary).

Update the existing single-page hero and the three service sections to incorporate the uploaded/static images using responsive grid/card layouts, safe cropping (object-cover), and English alt text; ensure the hero uses frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-photo.dim_1600x900.jpg with an overlay/gradient to preserve text readability; distribute all 12 uploaded images across hero + service sections (and optional small in-section galleries) while keeping mobile layouts free of overflow and maintaining performance via the generated optimized variants where available.

requirements.summary: Replace favicon with enhanced generated icon derived from the signboard image and update header/footer logo to match the new brand icon.
acceptanceCriteria: The HTML head includes favicon links that load the new generated icon assets (e.g., 32x32 favicon + 180x180 apple-touch icon).
Browser tab/favicon updates correctly after rebuild.
Header and footer logo render crisply and consistently with the updated brand icon (no stretching; transparent background if applicable).

file_operations.description: Add the generated square brand icon asset derived from the signboard image.
Add the generated 32x32 favicon asset.
Add the generated Apple touch icon asset.

Update the HTML head to include favicon and apple-touch-icon link tags referencing frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-32.dim_32x32.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png, ensuring the new icons load after rebuild.

Replace the header and footer logo image usage to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/bmc-icon.dim_512x512.png, ensuring crisp rendering (no stretching) and consistent sizing across breakpoints.
